## Vault.readBinary() method

Read the content of a binary file stored inside the vault.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readBinary(file: TFile): Promise<ArrayBuffer>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter         | Type                | Description |
| ----------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| <code>file</code> | [`TFile`](../TFile) |             |

**Returns:**

`Promise<``ArrayBuffer``>`
